document_data.name: Foundries
document_data.mainbody: The '''foundries''' of [[Hiyal]] were the source of the cities' endless riches and pollution around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The structure of the foundries was located just north of Hiyal along [[Al-Wahl River]].
document_data.Activities: Many of the finest weapons throughout the [[Zakhara|Land of Fate]] were forged in the foundries. The [[mamluk]]s of [[Qudra]] commissioned hundreds of weapons on a yearly basis. Weaponsmiths and armorers travelled to Hiyal to develop their craft. The fires of the foundries never stopped, blazing through each night belching forth fine weaponry and thick soot.
